name: .ARX File Extension
summary: Learn about .ARX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Extension file created for AutoCAD, a design and engineering application for 2D and 3D products; contains an application component written using Autodesk's ObjectARX, an object-oriented API that allows developers to customize and extend AutoCAD using C++, C#, and VB.NET program code.

content: ObjectARX SDKs are released with each version of AutoCAD, so you need to match the SDK version with the appropriate AutoCAD version.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
